trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player gains 5 life and draws a card.

trans-unit.resname: PELD·16p | Happily Ever After | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are five colors among permanents you control, there are six or more card types among permanents you control and/or cards in your graveyard, and your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are five colors among permanents you control, there are six or more card types among permanents you control and/or cards in your graveyard, and your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, you win the game.
